targets.expr:
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_calls{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_calls{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_seconds_total{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_seconds_total{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_rows{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_rows{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_wal_bytes{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_wal_bytes{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_wal_fpi{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_wal_fpi{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_block_read_seconds_total{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_block_read_seconds_total{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_block_write_seconds_total{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_block_write_seconds_total{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_temp_bytes_written{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_temp_bytes_written{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_temp_bytes_read{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_temp_bytes_read{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by () * 100

panels.title: Query Statistics (pg_stat_statements)  from ${__from:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}   to ${__to:date:YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss}

targets.expr:
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_wal_records{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by (queryid,datname)
/ ignoring(queryid,datname) group_left
sum(
  increase(pg_stat_statements_wal_records{fqdn="$fqdn"}[$__range])
) by ()

panels.description: based on pg_wait_sampling representation of wait events

targets.expr: topk($topn, sum by (wait_type, wait_event, queryid) (pg_wait_sampling_count{fqdn="$fqdn", wait_type!~""})/1500)
topk($topn, sum by (wait_type, wait_event, queryid) (pg_wait_sampling_count{fqdn="$fqdn", wait_type=""})/1500)

panels.title: Top $topn queries by wait events
